article_title: Mayor Andy Berke's wife, Monique, has a new job

article_metadata.description: Monique Berke, a 25-year business consultant and manager in the financial services industry and wife of Chattanooga Mayor Andy Berke, has joined the executive staff of CBL & Associates Properties Inc.

og.description: Monique Berke, a 25-year business consultant and manager in the financial services industry and wife of Chattanooga Mayor Andy Berke, has joined the executive staff of CBL & Associates Properties Inc.
